languages.text: "И вновь ксеноересь?! Как смеешь ты подсовывать подобную дрянь истинно{mf|му|й} слуге Императора?"

traits.locale_text: "И вновь ксено-ересь?! Как смеешь ты подсовывать подобную дрянь истинно{mf|му|ой} слуге Императора?"

languages.text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"
languages.original_text: "И вновь ксеноересь?! Как смеешь ты подсовывать подобную дрянь истинно{mf|му|й} слуге Императора?"

traits.locale_text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"
"Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"
"Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"
"Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"

languages.text: “又是异形的造物吗？你竟敢把这些肮脏的东西送给帝皇真正的仆人，真是好大的胆子！”
languages.original_text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: “又是异形的造物吗？你竟敢把这些肮脏的东西送给帝皇真正的仆人，真是好大的胆子！”

languages.text: «¿Más xenoherejía? ¡Hace falta mucho valor para intentar endosar esta basura a un{mf||a} sirviente fiel del Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Más xenoherejía? ¡Hace falta mucho valor para intentar endosar esta basura a un{mf||a} sirviente fiel del Emperador!».

languages.text: 「まだ異端の異種族がいたのか？皇帝に心底仕える従者にこのような悪事の協力を求めるとは、いい度胸だな！」
languages.original_text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: 「まだ異端の異種族がいたのか？皇帝に心底仕える従者にこのような悪事の協力を求めるとは、いい度胸だな！」

languages.text: « Encore des horreurs xénohérétiques ? Vous êtes gonflée de chercher à refourguer ça à {mf|un fidèle serviteur|une fidèle servante} de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: « Encore des horreurs xénohérétiques ? Vous êtes gonflée de chercher à refourguer ça à {mf|un fidèle serviteur|une fidèle servante} de l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: "Noch mehr Xenohäresie? Ihr habt wirklich Nerven, diesen Dreck {mf|einem wahren Diener|einer wahren Dienerin} des Imperators andrehen zu wollen!"
languages.original_text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Noch mehr Xenohäresie? Ihr habt wirklich Nerven, diesen Dreck {mf|einem wahren Diener|einer wahren Dienerin} des Imperators andrehen zu wollen!"

languages.text: "Bu zeno kâfirliğinin haddi hesabı yok mu? Bu şerefsizlikle İmparator'un hakiki bir hizmetkârını kandırmaya çalıştığına göre yürek yemişsin herhâlde!"
languages.original_text: "Yet more xenoheresy? You have some nerve trying to peddle this filth to a true servant of the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu zeno kâfirliğinin haddi hesabı yok mu? Bu şerefsizlikle İmparator'un hakiki bir hizmetkârını kandırmaya çalıştığına göre yürek yemişsin herhâlde!"
